name: AmericanExerciseTerms
label: American exercise terms
explanatoryNote: Under certain circumstances, early exercise may be advantageous to the option holder.
definition: exercise terms that stipulate that an option may be exercised on or before the date of expiration

name: ExerciseTerms
label: exercise terms
definition: contract terms specific to the conditions, conventions and other stipulations related to the exercise of an option or entitlement

name: EuropeanExerciseTerms
label: European exercise terms
definition: exercise terms that stipulate that an option may only be exercised at the date of expiration

name: BermudanExerciseTerms
explanatoryNote: The Bermuda option is named as such because its exercise dates are more flexible than European options and less flexible than American options. Thus, it is in the middle, just like Bermuda is between Europe and America. Bermuda options are also referred to as Mid-Atlantic, Quasi American, or Semi-American options.
label: Bermudan exercise terms
definition: exercise terms that stipulate that an option may only be exercised on predetermined dates within some exercise window, often on one day each month or at the date of expiration

name: ExerciseConvention
label: exercise convention
definition: convention that determines when the holder or future holder of an option can implement the rights defined in the option

name: CanaryExerciseTerms
definition: exercise terms that stipulate that an option may only be exercised on predetermined dates until the first step is reached, but not after that point
label: canary exercise terms

name: AmericanExerciseConvention
label: American exercise convention
definition: exercise convention that stipulates that an option may be exercised anytime between the purchase date and date of expiration

name: CanaryExerciseConvention
definition: exercise/call convention that stipulates that an option may only be exercised on predetermined dates until the first step is reached, but not after that point
label: canary exercise convention

name: BermudanExerciseConvention
label: Bermudan exercise convention
definition: exercise convention that stipulates that an option may be exercised anytime between the purchase date and date of expiration

name: hasExerciseWindow
label: has exercise window
definition: indicates a period of time during which the option may be exercised as specified in the terms of the contract

name: EuropeanExerciseConvention
definition: exercise convention that stipulates that an option may only be exercised at the date of expiration
label: European exercise convention

name: hasExerciseDate
definition: indicates a date on which an option may be exercised as specified in the terms of the contract
label: has exercise date

name: hasExerciseTerms
label: has exercise terms
definition: links a derivative, such as an option or entitlement, to any exercise terms that are specified therein
